verses.verse: The words <WH1697> of Agur <WH94> the son <WH1121> of Jakeh <WH3348>, even the prophecy <WH4853>: the man <WH1397> spake <WH5002> <WH8803> unto Ithiel <WH384>, even unto Ithiel <WH384> and Ucal <WH401>,
Surely I am more brutish <WH1198> than any man <WH376>, and have not the understanding <WH998> of a man <WH120>.
I neither learned <WH3925> <WH8804> wisdom <WH2451>, nor have <WH3045> <WH8799> the knowledge <WH1847> of the holy <WH6918>.

Who hath ascended up <WH5927> <WH8804> into heaven <WH8064>, or descended <WH3381> <WH8799>? who hath gathered <WH622> <WH8804> the wind <WH7307> in his fists <WH2651>? who hath bound <WH6887> <WH8804> the waters <WH4325> in a garment <WH8071>? who hath established <WH6965> <WH8689> all the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>? what is his name <WH8034>, and what is his son's <WH1121> name <WH8034>, if thou canst tell <WH3045> <WH8799> ?
Havahry word <WH565> of 'Elohim <WH433> is pure <WH6884> <WH8803>: he is a shield <WH4043> unto them that put their trust <WH2620> <WH8802> in him.
Add <WH3254> <WH8686> thou not unto his words <WH1697>, lest he reprove <WH3198> <WH8686> thee, and thou be found a liar <WH3576> <WH8738>.
Two <WH8147> things have I required <WH7592> <WH8804> of thee; deny <WH4513> <WH8799> me them not before I die <WH4191> <WH8799>:

Remove far <WH7368> <WH8685> from me vanity <WH7723> and lies <WH1697> <WH3577>: give <WH5414> <WH8799> me neither poverty <WH7389> nor riches <WH6239>; feed <WH2963> <WH8685> me with food <WH3899> convenient <WH2706> for me:

Lest I be full <WH7646> <WH8799>, and deny <WH3584> <WH8765> thee, and say <WH559> <WH8804>, Who is the YY <WH3068>? or lest I be poor <WH3423> <WH8735>, and steal <WH1589> <WH8804>, and take <WH8610> <WH8804> the name <WH8034> of my 'Elohim <WH430> in vain.
Accuse <WH3960> <WH8686> not a servant <WH5650> unto his master <WH113>, lest he curse <WH7043> <WH8762> thee, and thou be found guilty <WH816> <WH8804>.
There is a generation <WH1755> that curseht <WH7043> <WH8762> their father <WH1>, and doth not bless <WH1288> <WH8762> their mother <WH517>.
There is a generation <WH1755> that are pure <WH2889> in their own eyes <WH5869>, and yet is not washed <WH7364> <WH8795> from their filthiness <WH6675>.
There is a generation <WH1755>, O how lofty <WH7311> <WH8804> are their eyes <WH5869> ! and their eyelids <WH6079> are lifted up <WH5375> <WH8735>.

There is a generation <WH1755>, whose teeth <WH8127> are as swords <WH2719>, and their jaw teeth <WH4973> as knives <WH3979>, to devour <WH398> <WH8800> the poor <WH6041> from off the earth <WH776>, and the needy <WH34> from among men <WH120>.

The horseleach <WH5936> hath two <WH8147> daughters <WH1323>, crying, Give <WH3051> <WH8798>, give <WH3051> <WH8798>. There are three <WH7969> things that are never satisfied <WH7646> <WH8799>, yea, four <WH702> things say <WH559> <WH8804> not, It is enough <WH1952>:

The grave <WH7585>; and the barren <WH6115> womb <WH7356>; the earth <WH776> that is not filled <WH7646> <WH8804> with water <WH4325>; and the fire <WH784> that saith <WH559> <WH8804> not, It is enough <WH1952>.

The eye <WH5869> that mocketh <WH3932> <WH8799> at his father <WH1>, and despiseht <WH936> <WH8799> to obey <WH3349> his mother <WH517>, the ravens <WH6158> of the valley <WH5158> shall pick it out <WH5365> <WH8799>, and the young <WH1121> eagles <WH5404> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> it.
There be three <WH7969> things which are too wonderful <WH6381> <WH8738> for me, yea, four <WH702> which I know <WH3045> <WH8804> not:

The way <WH1870> of an eagle <WH5404> in the air <WH8064>; the way <WH1870> of a serpent <WH5175> upon a rock <WH6697>; the way <WH1870> of a ship <WH591> in the midst <WH3820> of the sea <WH3220>; and the way <WH1870> of a man <WH1397> with a maid <WH5959>.

Such is the way <WH1870> of an adulterous <WH5003> <WH8764> woman <WH802>; she eateth <WH398> <WH8804>, and wipeth <WH4229> <WH8804> her mouth <WH6310>, and saith <WH559> <WH8804>, I have done <WH6466> <WH8804> no wickedness <WH205>.
For three <WH7969> things the earth <WH776> is disquieted <WH7264> <WH8804>, and for four <WH702> which it cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> bear <WH5375> <WH8800>:
For a servant <WH5650> when he reigneth <WH4427> <WH8799>; and a fool <WH5036> when he is filled <WH7646> <WH8799> with meat <WH3899>;
For an odious <WH8130> <WH8803> woman when she is married <WH1166> <WH8735>; and an handmaid <WH8198> that is heir <WH3423> <WH8799> to her mistress <WH1404>.
There be four <WH702> things which are little <WH6996> upon the earth <WH776>, but they are exceeding <WH2449> <WH8794> wise <WH2450>:
The ants <WH5244> are a people <WH5971> not strong <WH5794>, yet they prepare <WH3559> <WH8686> their meat <WH3899> in the summer <WH7019>;
The conies <WH8227> are but a feeble <WH6099> folk <WH5971>, yet make <WH7760> <WH8799> they their houses <WH1004> in the rocks <WH5553>;
The locusts <WH697> have no king <WH4428>, yet go they forth <WH3318> <WH8799> all of them by bands <WH2686> <WH8802>;
The spider <WH8079> taketh hold <WH8610> <WH8762> with her hands <WH3027>, and is in kings <WH4428> ' palaces <WH1964>.
There be three <WH7969> things which go <WH6806> well <WH3190> <WH8688>, yea, four <WH702> are comely <WH2895> <WH8688> in going <WH3212> <WH8800>:
A lion <WH3918> which is strongest <WH1368> among beasts <WH929>, and turneth not away <WH7725> <WH8799> for <WH6440> any;
A greyhound <WH4975> <WH2223>; an he goat <WH8495> also <WH176>; and a king <WH4428>, against whom there is no rising up <WH510>.
If thou hast done foolishly <WH5034> <WH8804> in lifting up <WH5375> <WH8692> thyself, or if thou hast thought evil <WH2161> <WH8804>, lay thine hand <WH3027> upon thy mouth <WH6310>.

Surely the churning <WH4330> of milk <WH2461> bringeth forth <WH3318> <WH8686> butter <WH2529>, and the wringing <WH4330> of the nose <WH639> bringeth forth <WH3318> <WH8686> blood <WH1818>: so the forcing <WH4330> of wrath <WH639> bringeth forth <WH3318> <WH8686> strife <WH7379>.
